body.name: Wall Shelves Set of 8, Width 6in Black Floating Shelves for Wall Decor, Modern and Rustic Home Decor, Wood Shelves for Bedroom, Living Room, Bathroom, Kitchen,Corner, Office and Plants
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 3 mins
features: 🎁🎄【Embrace the New Year & Back-to-School Season】Introducing SALA Custom Gift Boxes - the impeccable choice for gifts that will bring delightful surprises to your family, friends, loved ones, and even your beloved kitten!

【DIY Your Own Display Corner】 Great value for money! Floating shelves for wall decor set of 8 meets your decorating needs at once. Don't fret over cluttered desktops and cabinets! The wonderful combination of smooth metal brackets and solid wood texture, SALA shelves for room wall makes your home look prettier and neater!

【Multi-Functional Floating Shelf for Wall 】 Introduce versatile shelving wall mounted options to enhance storage and organization in the bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, coffee bar and other areas. You can use it as a corner shelf, floating plant shelf, kids bookshelf, and cat wall shelves. In the kitchen, you can conveniently store cookbook, spice jars and utensils. The bathroom offers ample space for toiletries and towels. The living room becomes an exquisite display for small plants, trophies, collectibles, books, photos, and even serves as a cozy perch for cats.

【100% Natural Wood & Wall Mounted Design 】 Solid wood shelves with metal hanging shelf brackets are made of durable and sturdy paulownia wood that will last for years to come. Our wood boards are carefully carbonized and fumigated, and then coated with varnish to prevent moisture. The treatment process is non-toxic and harmless, but allows the product to be acid-resistant, heat-resistant, and easy to clean. Decorative shelf for wall adds character to any modern, traditional, rustic, or farmhouse decor home & kitchen styles.

【Super Sturdy Shelves for Wall】 Each wooden shelf: 16.5 X 6 X 0.6in. Package includes 8 paulownia boards, 16 metal brackets, 32 plastic anchors, 32 long screws, 32 short screws, 1 screwdriver, and 1 bubble level. We also provide you with a detailed install instructions for you to install the shelves in a few minutes.In addition, our shelves for wall storage can hold up 40 lbs of weight when you install them firmly on the wall.

【SALA - Handcrafted with Care】 Our wall mounted shelves for storage may not be perfectly flawless as they are crafted by hand. We value customers satisfaction above all else. If you have any advice, please let us know how to do it better. And If you enjoy our rustic floating shelves, we would be truly grateful if you could share your love and product experience with other customers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Functional and Decorative Wood Wall Shelves

Natural Board 100% natural solid paulownia wood has a clear texture and unique craftsmanship. Sturdy Brackets The brackets are sturdy and durable. Easy Installation The installation manual allows you to easily install it in a few minutes. (Note: Need drilled holes) 40LBS Load-bearing Capacity Our wall shelves can hold up 40 lbs of weight when you install them firmly on the wall.
Transform Your House into a Home with SALA!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect balance between style and functionality
reviews.reviewText: These shelves strike the perfect balance between style and functionality, enhancing any room effortlessly. Not real wood, but you get what you pay for. Good enough for a kid's room that will change with time. Consider the items you place on them, would not put anything overly heavy, but easily hold 10-15lbs depending on your wall anchors.Pros:- Sleek Design: Modern, minimalist aesthetics elevate the overall look of my space.- Sturdy Build: Quality craftsmanship ensures durability and supports a variety of items.- Easy Installation: Hassle-free setup with clear instructions; no need to be a DIY expert.- Versatility: Ideal for showcasing decor, books, or even plants, providing endless styling options.- Space Saver: Maximizes storage without compromising on elegance—perfect for smaller spaces.Cons:- Limited Color Options: A broader range would be appreciated to cater to diverse design preferences.- Weight Limit: While substantial, consider weight restrictions for heavier items. Shelves might sag a tiny bit with heavier loads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just as depicted
reviews.reviewText: These are cute. Not really meant for holding books or anything too heavy but I did manage to place them around my home office, bedroom and bathroom. I like how they turned out. Assembly is super easy. Thinking about ordering again for other bedrooms as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They look great
reviews.reviewText: I needed shelves in my bedroom but also needed them to be budget friendly. These shelves look beautiful and were easy to install. They are very light and I was worried about how they would hold up. I've only had them in for about 4 days but so far they are holding up great. I only have some books and frames on them right now so time will tell. But, for now I'm happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for everything I needed!! I used 6 of them in my bathroom to put everything on! The other 2 I used in my son’s bedroom for books and his switch accessories! No more cluttered counter tops!! Super easy to hang up!! The wood isn’t solid or heavy like oak. Its a light wood but sturdy. Perfect for anything you’re going to put on them!! Love these, definitely recommend getting them if you’re looking for extra space in your house!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we wanted
reviews.reviewText: These were packaged really beautifully and come with everything you need to install them, including a leveler. Beautifully done and looks great on my wall!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: They look nice and fulfil their purpose, some of them lean forward a bit, and they don't align perfectly when putting them side by side, but it's good value for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolute Certified Banger!!
reviews.reviewText: I first was a bit skeptical about the shelves being sturdy enough to even hold as something as light as my funkos, but I was proven otherwise. It was an easy set up. The quality of the shelves are top notch and lightweight, and overall I am extremely satisfied with the price I paid for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described!
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and as described! Look great!
